author: sky.cactus
content:
> Also I would like to propose making @Micah an author, particularly if this is merged. Although I will say being an author has it downsides, namely that you can't open a PR for review- it just gets automerged. 
You can create a WIP PR that won't get automerged.  Good for big changes like this that require discussion.
